snippet.title: Killing Machine Movement Cutscene Trailer
snippet.description:
https://www.killingmachinemovement.com

Our Mr. McKay requested a cutscene trailer be made. Here it is!
I made mistakes during the process which screwed the video quality a bit. The image quality does not represent that of the game.

Big thanks to the great Teja P. All of the music in this trailer was made by him and is also in the game. He also provides one of the voices featured in this trailer.

https://kadormazing.itch.io/movement
https://www.indiedb.com/games/killing-machine-movement
